strapiSolution.headerText: We are dedicated to see you succeed
strapiSolution.helpText: Our main goal is to help you succeed, our team of specialist will be there when you need us, able to expand and contract for your needs.

nodes.title: Code Security
nodes.shortText: We are a security focused company and make sure all our code is up to local and international security standards.

nodes.title: Agile Scrum
nodes.shortText: Speed and efficiency are top of mind so we use scrum methodology were ever possible

nodes.title: Elastic Development
nodes.shortText: Only pay for what you are using, let our teams and servers expend and contract to suit your needs
